dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] ABUSE ISSUE]
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, September 29, 2004 1:07 PM
To: Legal Response
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] ABUSE ISSUE]

Forwarding to Legal for review.


-------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] ABUSE ISSUE
Date:         Wed, 29 Sep 2004 13:49:03 EDT
From:         Cardcontracts@aol.com
To:         abuse@theplanet.com



My name is emanuele, and I am the web designer for
www.creditcardmall.com <http://www.creditcardmall.com>.  It has come to
our attention that another person has copied our entire site and
replaced the phrases creditcardmall.com with the name
"Credit-Card-Zone.com"   This website Credit-card-zone.com is in direct
copyright violation.  They are also misrepresenting our website
creditcardmall.com.

They even forgot to remove our contact information on the contact page:

http://credit-card-zone.com/contact.html you can see my contact
infromation for CreditCardMall.com there.  This is obviously fradulent
activity.

WE would like this ENTIRE DOMAIN AND ALL OF ITS PAGES removed immediatly.


the contact information shows  webmaster@alexhome.com
<mailto:webmaster@alexhome.com> and we believe the site
credit-card-zone.com is beign hosted by one of your partners.  I have
already contact eh whois contact for credit-card-zone.com in the name of
Bill Kane at 1-251-973-2034 and they claim they dont do anything with
computers and the site is not theirs.  I feel this is fradualent activity.



please research  credit-card-zone.com and alexhome.com (there email
contact) to have this site removed.

please keep me informed

Emanuele
973-220-5801
cardcontracts@aol.com <mailto:cardcontracts@aol.com>


the website is plagarism posted as there own

contact information shows

-- 
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/
